traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The thug makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.
